title: Cyber Secrets Episode 1x11: Hacking - Forensic Network Analysis
description: In this episode, hacking/forensics with Wireshark and Network Miner is covered. Traffic is generated and sniffed. What next? You can use Wireshark to carve out images and files. Or you can use Network miner to automate some of the processes. Either way, if the target sends unencrypted traffic, you own all their data... Simple solution... Encrypt Everything! Enjoy!
